emuInput.TitMainTitle: Priests kneeling before altar, including Father William Dannecker, Father Paul Bassompierre, Father Thomas Lappan, and Bishop John J. Wright, gathered in celebration of cannonization of St. Martin DePorres, St. Brigid Roman Catholic Church
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 12, 1962, pg. 20, reads: "Canonizing St. Martin De Porres - The cannonization of St. Martin De Porres, which was conducted by Pope John Paul XXIII in Rome, Italy, May 6, was also solemnized by Roman Catholics in Pittsburgh at St. Brigid's Church, Centre Ave. Rites, witnessed by approximately 650 parishioners on Sunday evening was conducted here by Bishop John J. Wright, fourth from left. Other ceremonial celebrants, from left, are: Father William Dannecker, Father Paul Bassompierre and Father Thomas Lappan. Father John LaBauve, not in picture, gave the benediction with the blessed sacrament. - Harris Photo"
